businesslogic

Class OrderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslogic.OrderManager

  • public class OrderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class delegates persistence to the datastorage layer and receives entity's from the datastorage layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Heesters, Renée Vroedsteijn, Thomas Roovers

      • updateProduct

        public boolean updateProduct(int productNr,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             long prepTime,
                             long price)
        This method calls a method from the ProductDAO to update a product in the database.
        Parameters:
        productNr - The number of the product.
        name - The name of the product.
        prepTime - The preparation time of the product.
        price - The price of the product.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the method.

      • createNewProduct

        public int createNewProduct(long priceValue,
                            int menuID,
                            java.lang.String nameValue,
                            java.lang.String descriptionValue,
                            long prepTimeValue)
        This method calls a method from the ProductDAO to create a new product in the database.
        Parameters:
        priceValue - The price of the product.
        menuID - The "category" of the product.
        nameValue - The name of the product.
        descriptionValue - The description of the product.
        prepTimeValue - The preperation time of the product.
        Returns:
        A new product number.

      • deleteProduct

        public boolean deleteProduct(int productNr)
        This method calls a method from the ProductDAO to delete a product from the database.
        Parameters:
        productNr - A number to indicate which product is meant.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the method.
